posts.title: Fun & Approachable History Book Series for Middle Grade Readers
posts.text: These engaging book series use images, sidebars, graphs, and interesting storytelling devices to bring history alive for kids.

posts.title: Books for Kids Who Are Reluctant Readers
posts.text: Some kids love reading from day one, and others need to find the right book to start their journey toward being a lifelong reader.

posts.title: Stories of Courage: Water Tossing Boulders by Adrienne Berard
posts.text: The book draws eye-opening parallels between the Chinese and Black experience in the United States as it honors each oppressed group's unique experience and strength.

posts.title: Can't Beat 'Em? Join 'Em: A Booklist for Parents of Young Gamers
posts.text: These books feature popular video games that may be of interest to your young gamer at least long enough for a little screen break. They may also help you better understand what your kids are so into and why.

posts.title: Big Concepts for Little Kids: Child-Friendly Books to Help Grown-Ups Answer Hard Questions
posts.text: These picture books may be helpful to share with a young person in your life when you're not feeling sure how to answer their BIG questions.

posts.title: Picture Books Featuring Breastfeeding
posts.text: These books either speak specifically about breastfeeding or include imagery of a mother nursing her child within context.

posts.title: Truth or Dare: Read About the Other Side of Things
posts.text: When you read a work of non-fiction, are you looking to affirm your own beliefs, or challenge them? Here is a selection of book pairs that stand in contrast to one another.

posts.title: Library Resources for National Breastfeeding Month
posts.text: Everyone has different bodies, babies, and circumstances so whether you breastfeed, have tried, or prefer to formula feed, it's all right; you are an awesome mom!

posts.title: Children's Books Similar to the Oscar-Winning "Hair Love"
posts.text: If you loved "Hair Love", you'll love these books to share with young kids.

posts.title: Library, Lions, and Love—Oh My!
posts.text: Whether you are planning to head out, stay home, celebrate or eschew romance this Valentine's Day, the Library has you covered.

posts.title: Hansel and Gretel: New Looks at an Old Tale
posts.text: There's a Hansel and Gretel-inspired story for just about everyone.

posts.title: Stories of Courage: March Forward, Girl
posts.text: Discover the autobiography of Melba Pattillo Beals, who withstood hatred as a child and participated in the landmark integration of Arkansas schools as a member of The Little Rock Nine.

posts.title: Inside "The Kitchen" Comic Book Series and Film
posts.text: The upcoming film The Kitchen - starring Tiffany Haddish, Melissa McCarthy, and Elisabeth Moss - is based on an adult comic book series. Find out more, with recommended comic books, films, and TV shows from the comic creators and actors.

posts.title: Stories of Courage: The Unwanted - Stories of the Syrian Refugees
posts.text: In this touching graphic novel, writer-illustrator Don Brown answers the question: Why would people flee their homes, with little more than the clothes on their backs, despite the immense dangers and risks to their lives?

posts.title: All Kinds of Mermaids in Children's Books and Movies
posts.text: With inner beauty, enchanting voices, and majestic qualities, who doesn't want to be a mermaid? Here's our recommended list of books and videos that feature all kinds of mermaids for kids to enjoy.

posts.title: Stories of Courage: The Librarian of Auschwitz
posts.text: Learn about this unforgettable novel based on the true story of a teenage girl who oversaw the distribution of eight precious books during the Nazi invasion.

posts.title: This Just In! New Picture Books For Spring
posts.text: Check out some of the latest picture books to hit children's room shelves at a branch near you.

posts.title: This Just In: New Picture Books
posts.text: Check out some of the latest picture books to hit children's room shelves at a branch near you.

posts.title: This Just In: New Picture Books
posts.text: Check out some of the latest picture books to hit children's room shelves at a branch near you.
